Decision Analytics Associate - ZS Associates

July 2022 - April 2024
Technologies: Python, Deep Learning, TFT, DeepAR, LSTM, Tableau, Random Forest

Overview

As a Decision Analytics Associate at ZS Associates, I developed and deployed scalable machine learning solutions for sales forecasting and market analysis, building full-stack applications and data pipelines that drove significant business impact across multiple client engagements.

Key Contributions

ML Model Development & Deployment

Developed and deployed scalable ML models (DeepAR, TFTs, LSTMs) using Python, integrating them into production APIs with CI/CD pipelines, reducing manual forecasting by 50%.

Data Pipeline Engineering

Built and optimized ETL pipelines in Python and SQL, improving data processing efficiency by 40% with parallelized workflows and Airflow automation.

Full-Stack Application Development

Designed and maintained full-stack applications using Flask, Django, and React and Tableau, enabling interactive data visualization and real-time insights.

Deep Learning Forecasting Systems

Engineered innovative software applications utilizing Deep learning models including Temporal Fusion Transformers, DeepAR and LSTMs getting correct predictions 80% of the time.

Data Visualization & Client Engagement

Spearheaded a project to create interactive Tableau dashboards that visualized data analysis results from advanced machine learning models, enhancing decision-making processes for clients and increasing engagement by 30%.

Technical Details

Technologies Used: Python, Deep Learning, TFT, DeepAR, LSTM, Tableau, Random Forest

The role involved end-to-end machine learning solution development, from data pipeline construction to model deployment. Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated model deployment, designed ETL workflows with Airflow for efficient data processing, and built full-stack applications using modern frameworks to deliver insights to stakeholders.

Results and Impact

  • Reduced manual forecasting efforts by 50% through automated ML model deployment
  • Improved data processing efficiency by 40% with optimized ETL pipelines
  • Achieved 80% prediction accuracy with deep learning forecasting models
  • Increased client engagement by 30% through interactive Tableau dashboards
  • Delivered scalable solutions integrated into production environments with CI/CD automation
